field.filter: SELECT PC AS obj WHERE obj.org_id = :this->org_id AND obj.workstation_id = 0
SELECT DockingStation AS obj WHERE obj.org_id = :this->org_id AND obj.workstation_id = 0
SELECT Keyboard AS obj WHERE obj.org_id = :this->org_id AND obj.workstation_id = 0
SELECT Mouse AS obj WHERE obj.org_id = :this->org_id AND obj.workstation_id = 0
SELECT Headset AS obj WHERE obj.org_id = :this->org_id AND obj.workstation_id = 0
